biography_text: POLIS, Jared, a Representative from Colorado; born in Boulder, Boulder County, Colo., May 12, 1975; A.B., Princeton University, Princeton, N. J., 1996; business owner; entrepreneur; member of the Colorado state board of education, 2001-2007; chairman of the Colorado state board of education, 2004-2005; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eleventh and to the four succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2009-present).
